name: Cookie Invaders
description:
Cookie Invaders combines the classic space shooter action with rogue-lite and strategic ARPG elements where you fight your way through legions of evil cookies, empower your weapons by a massive skill tree and fight epic boss fights.

Far beyond they have been watching us, observing every step of mankind. Their goal: to invade, to destroy. Their plan: to deceive mankind. And so, they disguised as something harmless, as someting we love... Now its up to you to turn the tide.
